title: Web-Based Arabic Learning Course for Tourism Purposes: ADDIE Model Application

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers, emphasizing situation-based learning tailored to practical applications by current practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize over 500 core Arabic vocabulary terms required in tourism settings.
Learners can achieve over 80% communication accuracy in Arabic tourist interaction simulations.
Learners will understand cultural-specific tourism etiquette content provided on a web-based platform at a rate of 90% or higher
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
